p: Nitrogen doped graphene was prepared by grinding the graphite carbon rod sieved into a powder (99.9% Merck, Darmstadt, Germany) and 2,4,6-triamino-1,3,5-triazine (Merck, Hohenbrunn, Germany), further denoted as melamine, in a planetary ball milling machine (PM 400, Retsch Inc., DÃ¼sseldorf, Germany).
